rule:
Each

tag must contain multiple tags to emphasize multiple key words or phrases.
input: Spring brings flowers. Trees start budding. Days become warmer.
output:
```html

Spring brings flowers.

Trees start budding.

Days become warmer.

Spring brings flowers.

Trees start budding.

Days become warmer.

```
evaluation:

` tag, with at least three `

` tags in total. Each `

` tag should also contain one `` tag and multiple `` tags. In the provided output: - There are more than three `

` tags, which satisfies the requirement of having at least three. - Each `

` tag contains one `` tag. - Each `

` tag contains multiple `` tags (one or more). The output adheres to the formatting rules described. There is no explicit rule concerning content duplication, so repeating sentences doesn't violate the description. Hence, all conditions specified are met. No violation. OK
